derivation: from G1 (ἀκολουθέω) (as a particle of union) and (a road);
strongs_def: properly, to be in the same way with, i.e. to accompany (specially, as a disciple)
outline:
1. to follow one who precedes, join him as his attendant, accompany him
  2. to join one as a disciple, become or be his disciple
    1. side with his party
